item.title: Gun model
item.dc:creator: @catthoor catthoor
item.description:
@catthoor wrote:

Hi people, im trying to add a gun to my server…
I got already i good model and i added the this code in class8.java:

if(i == 15555){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 6969; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1850; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 1850;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 1850;//female wearing class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Desert Eagle"; class8.aByteArray178 = "This is the most powerful weapon in the whole world!".getBytes(); }
So, normal it will be that if i use:
::pickup 15555 1
I will get the gun in my invetory
But it wont happen, if i use:
::pickup 15555 1
My screen is frozen, cane som1 help me with it?

Read full topic
